constituent: delicious, spoon, sitting on the ground, sun, day
heisigStory: Something is so downright delicious that one spends the entire day with a spoon in hand gobbling it up.
koohiiStory1: Use a spoon to eat a DELICIOUS hot fudge sundae. Duh..
koohiiStory2: It´s sooo delicious I could spoon it in all day.
